alert.note: Alert for Greene; Hale; Marengo; Tuscaloosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 24 at 9:09AM CDT until March 25 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Alabama... Black Warrior River At Oliver Lock and Dam affecting Greene, Hale and Tuscaloosa Counties. .Flooding continues on the Black Warrior River and a flood warning remains in effect. Another statement will be issued by late tonight, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Black Warrior River At Oliver Lock and Dam. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 122.0 feet, Cattle in low lands begin to be cut off and may need to be moved to higher ground. At 125.0 feet, Flooding of some roads leading into homes in the Hemphill Bend area southwest of Tuscaloosa occurs. At 129.0 feet, Flooding of agricultural lands in areas southwest of Tuscaloosa occurs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 129.9 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:30 AM CDT Thursday was 132.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this afternoon and continue falling to 109.3 feet Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 129.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
